peliculas.sinopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
Documentary short film that portrays Las Hurdes (Cáceres), one of the poorest and least developed regions of Spain in 1932.

Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire presenting a new business model.
A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.
In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.
